title: Tech innovation for green world need of the hour, say business leaders at TERI summit - Moneycontrol
content: Tech innovation for green world need of the hour, say business leaders at TERI summit  Moneycontrol
description: Sunil Duggal, Group CEO of Vedanta Ltd, said, "Indian organisations have volunteered in capacity building, including Vedanta Limited which plans to establish an ESG (environmental, social and governance) Academy soon. It’s important to understand our responsibility and intention towards green technology.”
